dmca.title: DMCA complaint about selling fake rolexes
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Gaf Counsel [mailto:gafcounsel@gibney.com] 
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 11:09 AM
To: Copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

August 11, 2005

 

BY EMAIL: Copyright@theplanet.com

AND FIRST CLASS MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 N. Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

Attention: George Poletes

RE: ROLEX WATCH U.S.A., INC.

Dear Mr. Poletes:

This firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex"), the
owners of the federally registered Rolex Trademarks: ROLEX, PRESIDENT,
SUBMARINER, YACHT-MASTER, DAYTONA, GMT-MASTER, DATEJUST and Crown Device
(among others).

We are writing to request your assistance with a website hosted by your
service that is selling counterfeit Rolex products.

The www.milleniumreplicawatches.com website offers counterfeit and
infringing Rolex watches for sale. Such illegal use of the Rolex Trademarks
is likely to cause confusion and constitutes counterfeiting, trademark
infringement and dilution of Rolex's intellectual property rights in
violation of both federal and state laws. 

Pursuant to ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.'s policies and the
requirements of The Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") 1, please note
the following: 

1.        Signature of the undersigned set forth below.
        
2.        www.milleniumreplicawatches.com is offering for sale counterfeit
Rolex merchandise and the offer for sale and the sale of counterfeit
merchandise is prohibited by federal law (15 U.S.C.
